title: President administers oath to Dr Syed Anwar as Alim Judge of Federal Shariat Court
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 10 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on Monday administered oath to Dr Syed Muhammad Anwar as Alim Judge of the Federal Shariat Court at a ceremony held here at the President House.
The appointment has been made for a period of three years.
The president administered the oath in line with clause (2) of the Article 203C of the Constitution.
